channel.title: Linuxes on hlcooll
channel.description: Recent content in Linuxes on hlcooll

item.title: Snap安装
item.description: centos7安装snap #添加epel存储库并安装copr yum插件开始安装 sudo yum install epel-release sudo yum install yum-plugin-copr #添加仓库 sudo yum copr enable ngompa/snapcore-el7 #安装 sudo yum -y install snapd sudo systemctl enable --now snapd.socket sudo ln -s /var/lib/snapd/snap /snap snap --help centos8安装snap #添加EPEL存储库 sudo dnf -y install https://dl.Fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm # sudo dnf -y upgrade sudo dnf -y install snapd sudo systemctl enable --now snapd.socket sudo ln -s /var/lib/snapd/snap /snap snap --help
